code_events.event:
Fired inside the DBTech\Credits\Searcher\TransactionLog class in the getDefaultOrderOptions() method.

This allows you to add additional fields that transactions can be ordered by. This affects transaction searches in the control panel.

Callback signature:

\DBTech\Credits\Searcher\TransactionLog $transactionSearcher, array &$sortOrders

Arguments:

  1. \DBTech\Credits\Searcher\TransactionLog $transactionSearcher - TransactionLog searcher object.
  2. array &$sortOrders - Array of existing sort order fields.
